text: Example (Hybrid Index) file system parameters * 16-byte blocks e 2-byte block numbers * inode: 4 direct, 1 indirect, and 1 double-indirect blocks Example of sparse file with 3 blocks * LBN 2isat PBN 123 * LBN 6 is at PBN 456 and indirect block is at 125 ¢ LBN 31 is at PBN 789, double indirect block is at 129, indirect at 345 * draw this file’s meta data : use O to indicate a block is missing. 2%
